text: I prefer to use proper grammar and spelling online.
I like to elaborate with long genuine sentiments or explanations.
I usually don't enjoy posting memes.
Our community is a place where we should have serious discussions or debates.
There's something wrong with intentional misspellings and acting "silly" for the sake of it.
I mean what I say and say what I mean.
I enjoy reading and typing long drawn out "essayposts" or walls of text.
I present myself in a way that's decidedly different, adding a sort of "special creativity" to my personality.
My politics seem to change based on who I'm trolling.
Nothing wrong with some good old fashioned online larping, no need to be so serious or genuine.
I type in an particular way with a lot of emoticons and text faces :3
I joke around a lot.
Engaging in a way that emphasizes lighthearted fun is my preferred way to go about things.
I make things up about my ideology to joke around with or impress others.
I'd like to give a warm welcome to people just entering a community that I'm established in.
When I want something, I ask politely, with please, without pressure, giving thanks.
It hurts me to see others suffer, even if they have wronged me.
I care about those who are less fortunate and I want to do things to help.
I'm here to make friends, not enemies.
I want to resolve drama, conflicts, and beef, ensuring everyone gets along with each other.
I refrain from name-calling, swearing, and threatening.
People would not come to me for advice or emotional support/help, or if they did, I would turn them away.
There is no need for genuine feel-good interactions, I prefer keeping things unemotional.
I say things solely to alienate or anger others.
I don't allow myself to be pushed around by others, I do what I want.
I don't have faith in humanity, people are not good, the world is cold and harsh.
Others don't deserve what I have.
I have been called callous, insensitive, remorseless, or an "edgelord"
Those who advocate for unequal treatment of minorities should be handled stricly by moderation, or deplatformed.
We should be more strict about censoring support for slavery, fascism, and totalitarianism.
We must ensure support for queer identities.
Transgender individuals should be accepted, their pronouns respected, and their identities should be recognized.
Reactionary ideologies such as Nazism shouldn't be allowed within our community.
Ethnic and national backgrounds should not be a factor that others are judged by.
In the modern era, eugenics is a legitimate topic of discussion.
Throughout history, there have been misconceptions about China, North Korea, and Russia. It's reasonable to defend these states at times.
Despite the policies of our social media platform, we should allow and therefore not moderate leaking classified/military info and posting weapon/drug instructions.
My opinions could easily get me cancelled as they go against the woke narrative.
Political correctness has gone too far, we shouldn't have to be so careful about offending people.
Not all groups are equal, some commit more crime, some work harder than others.
Those who are politically illiterate should read theory before posting political commentary.
I do read or plan to read theory.
I have read 10 or more political, economic, or philosophical written works
I look down upon those who are clueless and uninformed about politics, economics, philosophy.
Politics should come from reading, research, or debate.
My views are based on my own insticts, values, and personal opinions that aren't derived from any particular thinker.
It's good to trust your gut and believe what truly feels right.
I'm not big on getting my views from reading, I tend to stay away from theory.
There's no need to let others influence my opinions; I can decide what's right by myself.
Beliefs are intuitive as opposed to being grounded in logic and reason.
Philosophy and economics are boring and needlessly complex subjects.
Politics should focus on real-world practically applicable solutions.
My ideology is currently in implementation/practice somewhere.
I disagree with many political positions based on how they are simply impractical, unworkable, or impossible.
I don't give credence or validation to "ideologies" that I know would make society collapse if one were to try to implement them.
Anything that couldn't possibly work in the real world, and/or isn't even meant to work in the real world, is not a real ideology.
We should put our effort towards solving real problems, not dreaming up ideal worlds, idealism is naïve.
There are whole communities that agree with my ideology, it's not far-fetched at all.
My ideology belongs into far future or far past, modern humanity is not ready for it.
There's no use trying to implement my ideology in the real world.
I prefer imagination over revolution or reform.
I have a self-insert; a personal unique ideology that I believe in, which is different from pre-existing ideologies.
I will not compromise in my politics.
We should not dismiss things as "utopian;" dreams should be chased.
People in our community look up to me and respect me.
When we rank members of our community according to personal opinion, others usually put me at the top of those lists.
I often see positive things being said about me online.
Generally, I have relatively few enemies within our community.
If people tried to ban me or advocate for my removal, many more would come to my aid and oppose that.
People see me as the incarnation of evil.
If I were to check what people in our community are saying about me, I would see a lot of negative comments and discussion of past incidents/mistakes.
I find myself often the target of insults and threats.
If I left the community, I would not be missed.
People tell me that I'm annoying.
Suggestive jokes and innuendos can be funny!
Moderation is too strict on risqué content.
People overreact to "inappropriate" remarks about community members.
We should have an NSFW space or section in our community.
I believe in libertine principles and I may be seen as hedonistic.
Prostitution is not valid, it is immoral or exploitative.
People are too degenerate online.
Lewd content should be banned.
People should *not* post obscene material or engage in adult-oriented discussions.
Reproductive organs and other indecent parts should not be mentioned.
